title: Cant get to login page....
body: So I have been trying to play for over a week now but every time i click the launch button nothing happens......in task manager there is nothing there. I have even uninstalled and re-installed the game. Can anyone please help with this!?!?!

replies.body: That could be because the service is failing to start, if you can't even see it in Task Manager. That's related to your OS and how it's functioning. Have you ever tampered with regedit or something along the same vein?
We have had these issues before and it comes around again..... i dont understand what the problem is to fix it!!! Of all the things.... being able to log in lol
